EmailTemplate.name: Session Attendance Thank You DoD
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VA Healh Connect CRM
Thank you for your attendance!
ATTENTION: HTML links in emails have been disabled to help users avoid phishing scams and other potential threats. Please copy the text between "< Caution-" and the ending ">," and paste the link into your web browser.
Hello {!Session_Participant__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
{!Session_Participant__c.Session_Attendance_Thank_You_Message__c}
For more information, please visit the event page.
{!Session_Participant__c.Event_Name__c}
Event Details
